projects.title: Flash Carma
projects.description:
Flash Carma is a web application that utilizes digital flashcards and helps the user study their custom material in an
 entertaining and enjoyable manner.

projects.title: Student Registration System
projects.description: Desktop application that allows students to keep track of courses. Additionally, professors can track and remove students registered within the system.

projects.title: Affair Manager
projects.description: Console application that allows a client to register and manage organizations, affairs, and members.
